name: Colorful Mind - IGMC
description:
"The silent emptiness of a mind can, sometimes, be filled by different colors... And that makes everything more bearable." 

JUST A LITTLE WARNING:

The simplified tileset and the absence of audio are purposeful to favor the proposal/idea of the game. The protagonist finds himself in an empty mind, as does the player who "controls" him.

Made with RPG Maker MV

Written by Harllen de Sousa Pinheiro

Art, Programming, and everything else by @Hto_TheCLS
